title.rendered: The local endowment fund against poverty

content.rendered:
[vc_row css_animation= » » row_type= »row » use_row_as_full_screen_section= »no » type= »grid » angled_section= »no » text_align= »left » background_image_as_pattern= »without_pattern » background_color= »#ffffff » z_index= » » css= ».vc_custom_1559747922642{padding-top: 50px !important;} »][vc_column width= »1/2″][vc_column_text css= ».vc_custom_1640788023161{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;} »]

What it is ?

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

The local endowment fund against poverty collects voluntary contributions from businesses, representing up to 2% of their net income, and allocates them to fund local projects to alleviate poverty among young people.

In participating, each business undertakes to support one or more local projects of its choice for a period of three years.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height= »60px »][/vc_column][vc_column width= »1/2″][vc_row_inner row_type= »row » type= »full_width » text_align= »left » css_animation= » »][vc_column_inner width= »2/3″]

“I would encourage all local authorities to take part in this initiative, which is the only one with a long-term impact and that actually works”
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width= »1/3″][vc_single_image image= »27290″ img_size= »full » alignment= »center » qode_css_animation= » »][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height= »10px »][vc_row_inner row_type= »row » type= »full_width » text_align= »left » css_animation= » »][vc_column_inner width= »1/4″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width= »3/4″][vc_column_text]

Marine Jeantet, Interministerial delegate for the prevention of and fight against poverty.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation= » » row_type= »row » use_row_as_full_screen_section= »no » type= »grid » angled_section= »no » text_align= »left » background_image_as_pattern= »without_pattern » background_color= »#ffffff » z_index= » » css= ».vc_custom_1559747922642{padding-top: 50px !important;} »][vc_column width= »1/2″][vc_column_text css= ».vc_custom_1640788275457{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;} »]

How does the local fund work ?

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

The local fund was created in response to the two following issues:

–there are insufficient resources to scale up high-impact community projects in favor of underprivileged youth and roll them out comprehensively;

-despite wanting to get involved in humanitarian projects, only 1.6% of companies actually sponsor such initiatives, often due to a lack of resources and in-house expertise in the matter.

The local endowment fund against poverty addresses these two issues in just 4 steps.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width= »1/2″][vc_empty_space height= »45px »][vc_video link= »https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lpAdbDgvC2k » align= »center »][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation= » » row_type= »row » use_row_as_full_screen_section= »no » type= »grid » angled_section= »no » text_align= »left » background_image_as_pattern= »without_pattern » background_color= »#ffffff » z_index= » » css= ».vc_custom_1559749477319{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;} » el_id= »schema_dat »][vc_column width= »1/4″][vc_column_text el_class= »scheme-img »][/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

ASSESSING
needs by region

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator type= »small » position= »center » color= »#888888″][vc_column_text el_class= »scheme-txt »]

Prioritising action for maximum impact

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width= »1/4″][vc_column_text el_class= »scheme-img » css= ».vc_custom_1559749293554{padding-top: 35px !important;padding-bottom: 15px !important;} »][/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Identifying
local projects

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator type= »small » position= »center » color= »#888888″][vc_column_text el_class= »scheme-txt »]

Selecting turnkey projects using several key criteria: how acute the need is, the efficiency of  the solution, the scalability of the solution, and how established the organisation is

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width= »1/4″][vc_column_text el_class= »scheme-img » css= ».vc_custom_1559749359118{padding-top: 27px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;} »][/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

RALLYING
local businesses

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator type= »small » position= »center » color= »#888888″][vc_column_text el_class= »scheme-txt »]

Each business commits to support one or more local projects for three years

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width= »1/4″][vc_column_text el_class= »scheme-img » css= ».vc_custom_1559749335284{padding-top: 45px !important;padding-bottom: 31px !important;} »][/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

MONITORING PROGRESS
of each projects

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator type= »small » position= »center » color= »#888888″][vc_column_text el_class= »scheme-txt »]

Participating businesses are provided with half-yearly progress reports

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation= » » row_type= »row » use_row_as_full_screen_section= »no » type= »grid » angled_section= »no » text_align= »left » background_image_as_pattern= »without_pattern » z_index= » » css= ».vc_custom_1595421752529{background-color: #ffffff !important;} »][vc_column][vc_row_inner row_type= »row » type= »full_width » text_align= »left » css_animation= » » css= ».vc_custom_1595421631678{background-color: #ffffff !important;} »][vc_column_inner width= »1/3″ offset= »vc_col-lg-offset-0 vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-offset-0 vc_col-md-4 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_column_text]

Nationwide rollout of the local funds

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css= ».vc_custom_1642581105940{padding-bottom: 20px !important;} »]After conducting three successful pilot projects in Nantes, Romans-sur-Isère and Béthune, which raised more than €1 million to finance over 20 initiatives and assist 10,000 young people in need, the Break Poverty Foundation  is currently extending the local funds with the aim of providing aid across 50 regions to 100,000 beneficiaries by 2022.

To do this, we assist local stakeholders (local authorities, regional foundations and employer networks) set up the project, from A to Z and at no charge![/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width= »2/3″ offset= »vc_col-lg-offset-0 vc_col-lg-8 vc_col-md-offset-0 vc_col-md-8 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_raw_html css= ».vc_custom_1599577466670{padding-left: 30px !important;} »]JTVCc2hvdy1pbnRlcmFjdGl2ZW1hcCU1RA==[/vc_raw_html][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner row_type= »row » type= »full_width » text_align= »left » css_animation= » » css= ».vc_custom_1595422132964{padding-left: 30px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;} »][vc_column_inner width= »1/3″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width= »1/3″ css= ».vc_custom_1595422192979{padding-left: 0px !important;} »][vc_empty_space]Find out more about the fund[vc_empty_space height= »15px »][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width= »1/3″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner row_type= »row » type= »full_width » text_align= »left » css_animation= » » css= ».vc_custom_1595435568247{background-color: #ffffff !important;} »][vc_column_inner width= »1/2″][vc_empty_space height= »45px »][vc_column_text css= ».vc_custom_1640788977244{padding-left: 40px !important;} »]

Advocators of the local endowment fund against poverty :

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width= »1/6″][vc_single_image image= »25325″ alignment= »center » qode_css_animation= » » qode_hover_animation= »zoom_in »][vc_empty_space height= »75px »][vc_single_image image= »25800″ img_size= »full » alignment= »center » qode_css_animation= » » qode_hover_animation= »zoom_in »][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width= »1/6″][vc_single_image image= »20397″ alignment= »center » qode_css_animation= » » qode_hover_animation= »zoom_in »][vc_empty_space height= »15px »][vc_single_image image= »21874″ alignment= »center » qode_css_animation= » » qode_hover_animation= »zoom_in »][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width= »1/6″][vc_single_image image= »26771″ img_size= »full » alignment= »center » qode_css_animation= » » qode_hover_animation= »zoom_in »][vc_empty_space height= »15px »][vc_single_image image= »26454″ img_size= »full » alignment= »center » qode_css_animation= » » qode_hover_animation= »zoom_in »][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text]

 

Crédit photo : Andrew Ibrahim, Unsplash.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row]
